title: Disney+ will actually crack down on password sharing next month
content: We knew it was coming, but Disney+ is going to start cracking down on users sharing passwords in September, CEO Bob Iger confirmed.

title: NASA now seriously considering SpaceX for Boeing astronauts' ride home
content: If NASA chooses to use SpaceX to bring astronauts Butch Wilmore and Suni Williams home from the International Space Station, they won't return to Earth for another six or so months.
summary: If NASA chooses to use SpaceX to bring astronauts Butch Wilmore and Suni Williams home from the International Space Station, they won't return to Earth for another six or so months.
